title: 泪目，印度终于有主流媒体认同刘仲敬的诸夏理念（误
contents:
via Twitter @rishi_suri

#RealMapOfChina | As #China continues on its expansionist mission around the world, @NewsX has decided to publish the real map of China which showcases all its territorial occupations & claims. Well done team NewsX! @Rishabh_Gulati_ @richakapoor27 @HindolSengupta @kamaldavar 

谷歌渣翻：
因#中国  继续执行其在世界各地的扩张主义使命， @NewsX 已决定发布真实的中国地图，以显示其所有领土占领和主张。做得好NewsX团队！

Rishi Suri被推特官方认证为「记者，资讯传播，公共政策」
而他转帖的@NewsX 被推特官方认证为「印度领先新闻频道，年轻人第一选择」

https://t.co/nwJpWbSzme
